entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Port Carling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:24 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Snow squalls early this morning. Risk of snow squalls late this morning and this afternoon. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:36 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:36 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
